channel.title: i2dash on The Machine Learned It Online
channel.description: Recent content in i2dash on The Machine Learned It Online

item.title: Using the i2dash R package for interactive visualisations
item.description: Keeping up with the huge range of R packages released and updates to existing packages can be time consuming and difficult, though important to monitor as there can be innovations that will save you time, if you are aware of them. One of the recent releases is the i2dash package for interactive visualisations in R. Now how helpful this is for you may depend on your expertise (or not) in developing shiny web applications.
